perturbation.original_text: 12.6 The laws of California shall govern the construction and enforceability of the Agreement. The parties agree that any action arising under or relating to the Agreement or the Licensed Software or Services shall lie within the exclusive jurisdiction of the Courts located in San Mateo County, California, USA. The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods will not apply to the Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.6 The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods will not apply to the Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Removed the clause dictating California law as the governing law. This introduces uncertainty, as the governing law is not explicitly stated, making it more difficult to determine which jurisdiction's laws apply and potentially weakening enforceability.

perturbation.original_text:
1.  APPOINTMENT OF CHANNEL PARTNER
1.1 General. iPass will make the Service available to Channel Partner in exchange for the fees referenced in the Exhibits attached hereto and
incorporated herein by reference. Channel Partner may order Services using an iPass approved order form available via the iPass Portal. Each order
form must reference this Agreement and each order form shall merge and incorporate the terms herein. Each order form is a separate and distinct
contractual obligation.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.  APPOINTMENT OF CHANNEL PARTNER
1.1 General. iPass will make the Service available to Channel Partner in exchange for the fees referenced in the Exhibits attached hereto and
incorporated herein by reference. Channel Partner may order Services using an iPass approved order form available via the iPass Portal. Each order
form must reference this Agreement and each order form shall merge and incorporate the terms herein. Each order form is a separate contractual obligation.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'separate and distinct' from 1.1 General, this introduces contradiction - are they separate, distinct, or a single contract?
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Severability of Contractual obligations
